articles.title: Metformin shows promise in NASH treatment
articles.abstract: A randomized study involving 200 NASH patients demonstrated that Metformin reduced hepatic steatosis and improved insulin sensitivity without major adverse effects.

articles.title: Metformin modulates gut microbiome in type 2 diabetes patients
articles.abstract: This clinical investigation found that long-term Metformin use alters gut microbial composition, correlating with improved glycemic control.
articles.key_findings: Improved glycemic control via microbiome modulation

articles.title: Repurposing Metformin for cancer prevention: an overview
articles.abstract: Review of multiple clinical and preclinical studies indicating that Metformin may reduce cancer incidence, particularly in colorectal and breast cancer.
articles.key_findings: Potential chemopreventive effect via AMPK activation

articles.title: Aspirin use and cardiovascular outcomes in diabetic patients
articles.abstract: Aspirin therapy significantly lowered the incidence of myocardial infarction and stroke among high-risk diabetic populations.

articles.title: Low-dose Aspirin in colorectal cancer prevention
articles.abstract: Low-dose aspirin correlated with reduced recurrence of colorectal adenomas in high-risk patients.

articles.title: Aspirin and risk of intracranial bleeding: a meta-analysis
articles.abstract: Comprehensive meta-analysis evaluating bleeding risk associated with chronic low-dose aspirin use across 15,000 participants.

articles.title: Semaglutide efficacy in obesity management: a real-world study
articles.journal: The New England Journal of Medicine
articles.abstract: A multicenter trial with 500 participants showed Semaglutide induced significant weight loss and improved lipid profiles.

articles.title: Semaglutide and cardiovascular outcomes in diabetic patients
articles.abstract: Post-market analysis indicates cardiovascular benefit of Semaglutide independent of glycemic control improvement.

articles.title: Semaglutide as a potential therapy for NASH: insights from phase 2 trial
articles.abstract: A phase 2 clinical trial showed Semaglutide significantly reduced hepatic fat content and fibrosis progression in NASH patients.

articles.title: Combination therapy of Semaglutide and Metformin in obese diabetic patients
articles.abstract: Combination of Semaglutide with Metformin showed synergistic effects in glycemic control and weight loss.
articles.key_findings: Enhanced HbA1c reduction compared to monotherapy

articles.title: Metformin and Semaglutide dual mechanism in NAFLD management
articles.abstract: Exploratory analysis suggests dual therapy may enhance hepatic lipid metabolism and reduce fibrosis in NAFLD.

articles.title: FDA guidance on GLP-1 receptor agonists for metabolic disease
articles.abstract: Guidance outlines regulatory expectations for safety assessment of GLP-1 receptor agonists including Semaglutide in obesity and NASH.

articles.title: FDA guidance on repurposing antidiabetic agents for liver diseases
articles.abstract: Provides framework for clinical trial design when evaluating drugs like Metformin for new hepatic indications.
articles.key_findings: Focus on adaptive trial design and safety endpoints

articles.title: Metformin and inflammation markers in NASH patients
articles.abstract: Metformin therapy reduced CRP and ALT levels, suggesting anti-inflammatory action beneficial in NASH.

articles.title: Low-dose Aspirin and Alzheimer's prevention: a longitudinal study
articles.abstract: A 7-year observational study found reduced Alzheimer's incidence among low-dose aspirin users over 65.

articles.title: Semaglutide and renal outcomes: emerging evidence
articles.abstract: GLP-1 receptor agonists like Semaglutide show renoprotective effects in type 2 diabetic nephropathy.

articles.title: FDA safety update: monitoring requirements for metformin
articles.abstract: Advisory regarding renal function monitoring in long-term Metformin users.
